name: You have a drunk friend
description: What will you play if you have a very drunk friend? A warm hearted angel? Or an evilbad guyï¼ŸYou may find answer in this fun weird game. Try exploring in the room and figure out how to sober up your friend, may it's not only just one solution,though,never hurt friend,and never do evil!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86 and x64 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent | AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 6000+ (2 * 3000) or equivalent Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 740 (2048 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 5770 (1024 MB) Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86 and x64 Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q9300 (4 * 2500) or equivalent | AMD A10-5800K APU (4*3800) or equivalent Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 7770 (1024 MB) Storage: 800 MB available space
